code: import{AXIOS}from"../api/endpoints";export function readLightState(){return AXIOS.get('/lightState');}export function updateLightState(lightState){return AXIOS.post('/lightState',lightState);}export function readBrokerSettings(){return AXIOS.get('/brokerSettings');}export function updateBrokerSettings(lightMqttSettings){return AXIOS.post('/brokerSettings',lightMqttSettings);}
